E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1978
Subject: Progress of Scott Brown
Dear Sir,
Scott Brown has nothing more to prove at A Quad Cities Angels!
He has an ERA of 3.91 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/19/1978
Subject: Billy Baldwin healing process
Billy Baldwin is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Please let me know if you are interested!

Ed Kirkpatrick

Subject: Progress of Joe Charboneau

to promote him soon!

Regards,

hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
